item.title: Useful Browser Extensions
item.description:
1. AdGuard AdBlocker ‚Äî Ad Blocking

In the age of information overload, distracting ads can disrupt your focus. A good ad blocker is essential ‚Äî one of the best is AdGuard AdBlocker.

Installation link:
AdGuard AdBlocker on Chrome Web Store

Or search manually in your browser‚Äôs extension store:

  • Chrome, Opera, Edge: chromewebstore.google.com
  • Firefox: addons.mozilla.org
  • Search term: AdGuard AdBlocker

Configuration

  1. Click the extension icon ‚Üí click the gear icon to open settings.
  2. In the Filters section, enable:
    • Ad Blocking
    • Privacy
    • Annoyances (blocks pop-ups like “Install Yandex Browser”)
    • Language-specific filters (e.g., Russian or your preferred language)
  3. Go to Tracking Protection to block trackers, including ad trackers.
  4. To manually block stubborn elements:
    • Right-click the extension icon ‚Üí Block ads manually
    • Hover over the element and click to block.

P.S. I’m not against ads ‚Äî but popups and phishing banners are just too much.

2. Wappalyzer ‚Äî Website Technology Profiler

Wappalyzer is a handy tool to find out what technologies a website uses.

How to use:
After installation, click the extension icon to view data about the site’s CMS, analytics tools, plugins, and more (especially useful for WordPress sites).

3. Alaev SEO Tools ‚Äî Express SEO Audit

Alaev SEO Tools provides a quick SEO overview of any webpage.

Features:

  • Overview ‚Äî meta tags (title, description), headings H1‚ÄìH6, sitemap status
  • Page ‚Äî highlight H1‚ÄìH6, check for missing alt tags, word count, reindexing in Yandex Webmaster, and PageSpeed testing
  • Links ‚Äî view internal/external links and follow/nofollow attributes
  • Images ‚Äî audit images for missing alt attributes
  • Structured Data ‚Äî inspect OpenGraph and Twitter metadata

‚ùó This is a quick audit, not a full-scale analysis.
For full audits, use:

  • üá∑üá∫ be1.ru, pr-cy.ru, rush-analytics.ru
  • üåç similarweb.com, semrush.com, ahrefs.com

4. Yandex Wordstat Assistant ‚Äî Keyword Collection Tool

To collect keywords from Yandex Wordstat, use Yandex Wordstat Assistant.

Install from:

  • Chrome
  • Opera
  • Firefox

How it works:
Visit wordstat.yandex.ru ‚Äî a panel will appear on the left side of the page.

Main functions:

  • Add keywords from the list
  • Copy keywords with or without frequency
  • Sort keywords alphabetically
  • Delete unnecessary queries

Copy your keyword list to Excel for analysis, clustering, and further SEO or ad campaign planning.

5. Font Finder ‚Äî Inspect Web Fonts

Use Font Finder to inspect any text element on a webpage.

What you can view:

  • Font family
  • Size
  • Color
  • Styling properties (e.g., bold, italic)

Install from:

  • Chrome / Edge
  • Opera
  • Firefox

6. ColorZilla ‚Äî Color Picker Tool

Pick any color from a webpage with ColorZilla. The hex code is automatically copied to the clipboard.

Extras:

  • Color Picker Panel ‚Äî saves color history
  • Press Esc to deactivate the tool

Install from:

  • Chrome / Edge
  • Firefox
  • Opera

7. GoFullPage ‚Äî Full Page Screenshots

GoFullPage ‚Äì Full Page Screen Capture takes full-length screenshots of web pages.

How to use:

  1. Install the extension
  2. Click the icon to start capture
  3. Save the result as PNG or PDF

Install from:

  • Chrome / Edge
  • Not available for Firefox
  • In Opera, install as a Chrome extension
